uvi.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v4.19.199
uvi.description:
net: qcom/emac: fix UAF in emac_remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.199 by commit 11e9d163d631198bb3eb41a677a61b499516c0f7, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 54e19bc74f3380d414681762ceed9f7245bc6a6e. For more details please see the references link.
